description: Boy standing up, facing window, looking outside, window showing a Christmas tree and presents
text: Boy: Oh, it's Christmas! I can't wait to open my presents!

description: Boy holding a big stack of presents
text: Boy: I have so many presents!

description: Boy sitting in front of a Christmas tree, surrounded by presents
Boy sitting in front of a Christmas tree, looking sad
text: Boy: I wish my parents were here.

description: Boy sitting in front of a Christmas tree, looking happy
text: Boy: I'm so grateful for everything I have.
